content.text:
#patchwork-dev 

I just wrote up a long and detailed post, but instead of clicking "preview & publish" I accidentally clicked "clear draft". Message deleted, undo doesn't work, I can't find it in memory, and I don't expect to get it back. What a bummer, especially since the two buttons are *so close together*.

Maybe #somebodyshould make an "are you sure" dialog when a post is above a certain length? I'm surprised that even Ctrl+Z didn't work, it's like the message was deleted and the `<textarea>` was banished to `/dev/null`.

ðŸ˜”
